nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.views

Class AbstractView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.views.AbstractView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhylogeneticView, StrainView

    public abstract class AbstractView
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    An abstract class for common functionality needed by all the views.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractView

        public AbstractView()
        Constructs a new AbstractView. Sets up the necessary transforms and translations for the panning and zooming.

    • Method Detail

      • getScale

        public javafx.scene.transform.Affine getScale()
        Returns:
        The scale used to scale the contents of the AbstractView.

        Adds all the transforms required for zooming and panning to the root child.
        Parameters:
        group - The root child of the AbstractView.

        Transforms a given bounding box from camera coordinates to world coordinates.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the transformed bounding box

      • pan

        public void pan(javafx.geometry.Point2D delta)
        Pan the camera by the amount given by the delta vector.
        Parameters:
        delta - the delta vector

      • zoom

        protected void zoom(double delta,
                    javafx.geometry.Point2D center)
        Zoom the camera by the amount given by zoom.
        Parameters:
        delta - the amount to zoom in
        center - the center of the zoom, in camera space

      • zoomInScroll

        public void zoomInScroll(double x,
                         double y)
        Zoom in for scrolling with the mouse.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the cursor.
        y - the y position of the cursor.

      • zoomOutScroll

        public void zoomOutScroll(double x,
                          double y)
        Zoom out for scrolling with the mouse.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the cursor.
        y - the y position of the cursor.

      • zoomIn

        public void zoomIn()
        Default zoom method. Zooms in the camera by a default amount and to the center of the view.

      • zoomOut

        public void zoomOut()
        Default zoom method. Zooms out the camera by a default amount and to the center of the view.

      • resetZoom

        public void resetZoom()
        Resets the zoom level to the default value.

      • resetTranslate

        public void resetTranslate()
        Resets the translation of the view to the default value.
